key_features: Up to 25X UNI$ for every S$5 spend (equiv. to 10 miles per S$1) on your preferred rewards category with no minimum spend required. Choose from Beauty & Wellness, Dining, Entertainment, Family, Fashion, Transport and Travel.
10X UNI$ (4 miles per S$1) + additional up to 15X UNI$ (6 miles per S$1) when you save with UOB Lady's Savings Account
Flexibility to change your Preferred Category Spending every quarter.
UOB Lady's LuxePay Plan 6 or 12-month installment plan with no interest or processing fees
Free e-Commerce protection for online purchases up to USD$200
Earn up to 6.0% p.a. interest with UOB One Account

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
air_miles: Up to 25X UNI$ per S$5 spent (equivalent to 10 miles per S$1) on your selected category, valid for online, in-store, local and overseas spend
No min. spend, Bonus 9X UNI$ and up to 15X Lady's Savings Bonus UNI$ is capped at S$1,000 spend per calendar month for UOB Lady's Card.
Convert your UNI$ into air miles at the conversion rate of UNI$1 = 2 miles
Terms and conditions apply for all above-mentioned privileges. Visit here for more details. Insured up to S$100,000 by SDIC.

Beauty and wellness: Bobby Brown, DrBrand, Elements Wellness, The Battleground, Jean Yip Beauty, NARS, Pablo Blau, Spa Esprit, Dr Lash, Raffles Spa and more

Dining: Haidilao Hot Pot, The Courtyard, The Fullerton Hotel Singapore, KPO Cafe & Bar, Tunglok Group, GrabFood, 2amdessertbar, Cinder Steakhouse, Nassim Hill Bakery Bistro Bar, Vineyard at Hortpark and more
Entertainment: Cathay Cineplexes, Golden Village, Shaw Theatres, Sistic, Zouk, KPO, Indochine, Harry’s, No. 5 Emerald Hill, Party World KTV, and more

Family: NTUC Fairprice, Cold Storage, CS Fresh, DON DON DONKI, Giant, Medi-Ya, Redmart, Motherswork, B_Together Dempsey Family Club, Healthway Medical, Lifescan Medical, LSC Eye Clinic, Raffles Dental
Fashion: Beyond the Vines, ByInviteOnly, Nike, Her Velvet Vase, Melissa, ZALORA, Club21, Kids21, SUSY + BAE, Luisa Via Roma and more
Transport: Grab, Gojek, Ryde, TADA, ComfortDelGro Taxi, SMRT Taxi, Premier Taxis, Shell Petrol Kiosks, Esso Petrol Kiosks, SPC, Caltex and more.
Travel: Agoda, AirAsia, Airbnb, ANA, Cathay Pacific, Emirates, EVA Air, Expedia, Jetstar, Korean Air, Scoot, Singapore Airlines, and more
Feel free to change your preferred rewards category as your lifestyle and interest evolves, any change will only take effect from the next calendar quarter.

UOB UNI$ Rewards points terms and conditions: General exclusions such as payments via AXS, EZ Link, PayPal, YouTrip, and bill payments, instalment plans, cash advance, payments to property, insurance, financial, educational, and governmental transactions will not qualify for UNI$ rewards points
